message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
You wanted a fair split, but I think I'm worth more.
You think you're worth more, but I'm not convinced. Let's compromise.
I'm still not convinced you're willing to give me my due. Let's see if you can do better.
Let's meet in the middle. No more negotiations, just a fair split.
I'm not settling for a tie. I'll take the lead and make it worth your while to accept.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'll give you a small lead, but don't expect it to last.
I'm not buying it, Alice. You're just trying to lull me into a false sense of security. I'll take a bigger lead this time.
I'm not going to give up yet. You're not getting everything, Bob.
I'm not going to let you dictate the terms, Alice. I'm taking control now.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything.
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or leave it.
